SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Class LogAppender.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogAppender.Builder
Enclosing interface:
LogAppender
public static final class LogAppender.Builder extends Object
Builder for creating standard appenders.

If the output is not set standard out will be used. If the encoder is not set a default encoder will be resolved from the output.
